meanings.sent1: The robot's movements were unprogrammed and unpredictable.
meanings.sent2: The unprogrammed computer displayed an error message.
meanings.sent3: The unprogrammed toy car kept crashing into walls, much to the amusement of the children.
meanings.sent4: Her unprogrammed responses to the interview questions surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unprogrammed fireworks lit up the night sky in a chaotic display.

meanings.sent1: The unprogrammed meeting caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent2: The unprogrammed event led to confusion among the attendees.
meanings.sent3: The unprogrammed picnic turned into a spontaneous adventure.
meanings.sent4: His unprogrammed decision to take a different route home proved to be a wise choice.
meanings.sent5: The unprogrammed visit from her friend brought unexpected joy to her day.
